Hopefully the OP will read this.  Just a correction, this lacks 7 songs not found in the collector's edition.  The ones listed above are correct in addition to "The Circle Tower".  Also since then the Leliana's Song DLC soundtrack has been released with 8 songs for those attempting to collect all the songs.

Source:http://dragonage.wikia.com/wiki/Dragon_Age:_Origins_-_Soundtrack
Didn't know they brought out a DA:O soundtrack
